top_categories.workout_context: Wish One Millau rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Wish One Millau’s french plateau, grands causses demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Wish One Millau isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Wish One Millau’s french plateau gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Wish One Millau when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Wish One Millau. Make this intensity feel like home.
Wish One Millau’s french plateau gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The varied gradients at Wish One Millau reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Wish One Millau — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Every session at Wish One Millau intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Wish One Millau — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on french plateau gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Wish One Millau — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Wish One Millau’s 70 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Wish One Millau. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Wish One Millau requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on french plateau gravel to build confidence. Expect: french plateau, grands causses, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 70 miles of french plateau gravel in Millau Grands Causses, France.
